title: Kaweco Classic Sport Ballpen—Fox
description:
The mixture of red and orange pigments makes the ballpoint pen in the color Fox a real eye-catcher. Inspired by current streetwear trends from the big cities, the color gives the pen an organic character.

The birth of the Kaweco Sport was back in 1911. The writing system ballpoint pen in the Skyline series must not be missed. It has a length of 10.5 cm and works with a high-quality heart-curve mechanism. It works particularly precisely and does not click when the push button is pressed.
  • Dimensions: 4.13 in.
  • Materials: Ball pen writing system
